title: Sethan
content:
Sethan Very Rare 3~15 Damage 1d12 +2 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlySethan: Spiritual GreataxeLevel 6 Evocation Spell Sethan: ReduceLevel 2 Transmutation Spell Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: When this are careens through the air toward an unfortunate head — the whistle of its spiritual counterpart is never far behind.
